data.title: Time zone list / Epoch to time zone converter
data.text:
There is only one Unix time and it is created by using the UTC/GMT time zone. This means you might have convert time zones to calculate timestamps. Most programming languages have libraries to help you converting time zones, calculating by hand might not be a good idea because of the variety of time zones en daylight saving times. But here's a list of time zones and offset in seconds.

Convert epoch to other time zone

Convert to time zone

Time zones

The 'Converted timestamp' column shows the time for Unix timestamp 1724021100 (Aug 18 2024 22:45:00 UTC/GMT).

Filter by city:

Daylight Saving Times (DST)
